actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the exchange of certain Federal public land in Madison County, Illinois.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to exchange certain Federal land in Madison County, Illinois, for certain land in that county owned by the Blue Tee Corporation. Subjects the exchange of such land to conditions that: (1) allow the United States to construct, operate, and maintain the Melvin Price Locks; and (2) reserve the right of the Blue Tee Corporation to remove any improvements on its land to be exchanged.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the exchange of certain Federal public land in Madison County, Illinois.
